messages.message:
Hi team,
My Crafting sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/abhishekadupa-jun14) seems to have issues—either with migration or seed data. A lot of functionality isn’t working and fails on core-platform with the following error. I tried the steps mentioned here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1749767684716479)—any suggestions on how to fix it?

```2025/07/23 21:40:16 WARNING coreplatformservice/aihub/handler.go:319 -- Unable to check platform status
2025/07/23 21:40:16 ERROR coreplatformservice/account/handler/preference.go:334 -- Preference does not exist
2025/07/23 21:40:38 ERROR coreplatformservice/account/handler/account.go:1048 -- Fail: Account with username (vffveaeve) not found
2025/07/23 21:40:42 ERROR coreplatformservice/repo/handler/repo.go:258 -- Fail: Repo (vffveaeve/admin) not found. Err: code = NOT_FOUND, msg = Record not found: sql: no rows in result set```
Have you tried logging in with the admin user created from db-init?
Login works from the `<mailto:noreply+admin@instabase.com|noreply+admin@instabase.com>`/`changeme123`  account, but creating an org, project or runs don’t work.
I see. Likely the db init was successful then. Can you check the DB to see if the orgs, repos actually exist?
